metadata.dc:author: Llarena Ibarguren, R
Peréz García, A
metadata.dc:description: Lipoma of the scrotum can arise from fat tissue of the spermatic cord and the scrotum, known as primary lipoma of the scrotum. Primary lipoma of the scrotum is a benign mesenchymal tumor. The rarity of this tumor type prompted us to report this case.
metadata.dc:title: Lipoma escrotal múltiple.
[Multiple scrotal lipoma].
